MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: f1297b7d-1a10-52ae-dd84-6d1ad2ae2fe6 title: Composition visual tree description: Composition Visuals make up the visual tree structure which all other features of the composition API use and build on. The API allows developers to define and create one or many visual objects each representing a single node in a visual tree.
